title: Universal Print: Information to help troubleshoot print failures
description:
Universal Print wants to eliminate most print failures automatically. For failures that cannot be eliminated completely, we want to make it more informative for admins to troubleshoot the issue. As a first step, the printerâ€™s jobs page will be enhanced by adding more information about the job like size of the print payload, document name, time taken at each step, error code for failed jobs with links to corresponding help page.
GA date: September CY2022
